about_the_game:
Introducing "Poly Parkour" – the ultimate test of your skills in the thrilling world of Jump'n Run gaming! Get ready to embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure filled with heart-stopping challenges and fast-paced action. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newcomer to the genre, this game is sure to captivate you with its intense gameplay.

In "Poly Parkour," you'll have the opportunity to showcase your agility and reflexes as you navigate through a series of meticulously crafted maps. Each map presents its own unique theme, immersing you in a variety of environments.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the obstacle-filled landscapes of "Poly Parkour"? Prepare to put your skills to the test as you strive for the best possible time on each map. Race against the clock and challenge yourself to beat your own records, or take on your friends in exhilarating battles to see who reigns supreme. The competitive spirit will fuel your determination to reach new heights and surpass your limits.

But beware – in "Poly Parkour," there are no second chances. The game is unforgiving, and even the slightest touch of a deadly obstacle could mean instant failure. Precision and timing are crucial as you jump, slide, and maneuver your way through the treacherous paths. Only the most skilled players will emerge victorious, making every victory a truly triumphant accomplishment.

With four distinct themed maps and a myriad of obstacles, "Poly Parkour" offers endless entertainment and challenge. Each map is carefully designed to test different aspects of your abilities, ensuring a fresh and engaging experience with every playthrough. Master the art of parkour as you conquer towering structures, leap across chasms, and overcome gravity-defying hurdles.

Immerse yourself in the immersive world of "Poly Parkour" and push your gaming prowess to the limit. Are you ready to face the ultimate challenge? Jump into the action now and embark on a thrilling adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat. It's time to prove your skills, conquer the maps, and become a legend in the world of "Poly Parkour"!

name: Poly Parkour

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 x 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 4 x 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Experience the adrenaline rush of "Poly Parkour"! Jump, slide, and race through themed maps, avoiding deadly obstacles. Battle friends or challenge yourself for the best time. With no second chances, precision is key. Will you conquer the challenge and emerge victorious?
